statements: UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET face_encoding = '\xDEADBEEF' WHERE person_id = 1;
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET person_id = 2, face_encoding = '\xABCD1234' WHERE person_id = 3;
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET face_encoding = 'face1' WHERE person_id = 1;
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET face_encoding = 'face2', person_id = 2;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET user_name='Alice', face_encoding=decode('00112233445566778899', 'hex') WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE face_matches SET confidence_score=0.95, timestamp=NOW(), user_id=2 WHERE match_id=3;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET user_name = 'Alice' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE face_matches SET confidence_score = 0.95, timestamp = '2022-10-25 12:00:00' WHERE match_id = 456
UPDATE FaceImage SET image_name = 'Person A' WHERE face_id = 1;
UPDATE FaceFeature SET feature_type = 'Facial Recognition' WHERE face_id = 2;
UPDATE FaceImage SET image_name = 'New Image 1' WHERE face_id = 1234;
UPDATE FaceFeature SET feature_data = 'New Feature Data', feature_type = 'Facial Recognition' WHERE feature_id = 5678;
UPDATE face_templates SET image_url = 'new_image_url' WHERE template_id = 1;
UPDATE face_logs SET log_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE face_templates SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE template_id = 1;
UPDATE face_matches SET match_score = 0.8 WHERE match_id = 2;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET encoding = 'abc123' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE face_matches SET match_score = 0.85, timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE match_id = 2;
